attributes.action: Reduce national speed limit on dangerous rural roads
attributes.additional_details:
By supporting this petition you will be supporting to keep our roads safe and offer peace of mind to the local community where some rural roads act as a death trap with blind junctions resulting in people taking unnecessary risks placing their life at risk.
This petition was triggered following living close to a dangerous junction where a number of serious traffic accidents have taken place and it has been out of the local council’s hands to reduce the speed limit given this is a set national speed on rural roads, generically. 

This will also add extra safety to children who use the roads to cycle on.
attributes.background: Please support in lowering the national speed limit on dangerous rural roads to reduce the number of road traffic accidents.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581079
